pokemon.name: treecko
pokemon.dex: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day's weather.

pokemon.name: grovyle
pokemon.dex: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.

pokemon.name: sceptile
pokemon.dex: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.

pokemon.name: torchic
pokemon.dex: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

pokemon.name: combusken
pokemon.dex: It boosts its concentration by emitting harsh cries. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

pokemon.name: blaziken
pokemon.dex: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.

pokemon.name: mudkip
pokemon.dex: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.

pokemon.name: marshtomp
pokemon.dex: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.

pokemon.name: swampert
pokemon.dex: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.

pokemon.name: poochyena
pokemon.dex: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.

pokemon.name: mightyena
pokemon.dex: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

pokemon.name: zigzagoon
pokemon.dex: A Pok√©mon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigs and zags.

pokemon.name: linoone
pokemon.dex: When running in a straight line, it can top 60 miles per hour. However, it has a tough time with curved roads.

pokemon.name: wurmple
pokemon.dex: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.

pokemon.name: silcoon
pokemon.dex: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.

pokemon.name: beautifly
pokemon.dex: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.

pokemon.name: cascoon
pokemon.dex: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

pokemon.name: dustox
pokemon.dex: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.

pokemon.name: lotad
pokemon.dex: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

pokemon.name: lombre
pokemon.dex: It lives at the water's edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.

pokemon.name: ludicolo
pokemon.dex: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

pokemon.name: seedot
pokemon.dex: If it remains still, it becomes impossible to distinguish from real nuts. It delights in surprising foraging Pidgey.

pokemon.name: nuzleaf
pokemon.dex: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.

pokemon.name: shiftry
pokemon.dex: A Pok√©mon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe's mind and take preemptive action.

pokemon.name: taillow
pokemon.dex: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.

pokemon.name: swellow
pokemon.dex: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.

pokemon.name: wingull
pokemon.dex: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the winter, it hides food around its nest.

pokemon.name: pelipper
pokemon.dex: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pok√©mon in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.

pokemon.name: ralts
pokemon.dex: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pok√©mon. It hides if it senses hostility.

pokemon.name: kirlia
pokemon.dex: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.

pokemon.name: gardevoir
pokemon.dex: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

pokemon.name: surskit
pokemon.dex: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.

pokemon.name: masquerain
pokemon.dex: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.

pokemon.name: shroomish
pokemon.dex: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

pokemon.name: breloom
pokemon.dex: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.

pokemon.name: slakoth
pokemon.dex: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.

pokemon.name: vigoroth
pokemon.dex: It is always hungry because it won't stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can't keep still.

pokemon.name: slaking
pokemon.dex: It is the world's most slothful Pok√©mon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

pokemon.name: nincada
pokemon.dex: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.

pokemon.name: ninjask
pokemon.dex: This Pok√©mon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.

pokemon.name: shedinja
pokemon.dex: A strange Pok√©mon--it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.

pokemon.name: whismur
pokemon.dex: It usually murmurs, but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.

pokemon.name: loudred
pokemon.dex: When it stamps its feet and bellows, it generates ultrasonic waves that can blow apart a house.

pokemon.name: exploud
pokemon.dex: It emits a variety of sounds from the holes all over its body. Its loud cries can be heard from over six miles away.

pokemon.name: makuhita
pokemon.dex: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pok√©mon that can withstand any attack.

pokemon.name: hariyama
pokemon.dex: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.

pokemon.name: azurill
pokemon.dex: It battles by flinging around its tail, which is bigger than its body. The tail is a flotation device in water.

pokemon.name: nosepass
pokemon.dex: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.

pokemon.name: skitty
pokemon.dex: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.

pokemon.name: delcatty
pokemon.dex: The favorite of trend-conscious female Trainers, they are used in competition for their style and fur.

pokemon.name: sableye
pokemon.dex: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.

pokemon.name: mawile
pokemon.dex: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

pokemon.name: aron
pokemon.dex: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is a pest that descends from mountains to eat bridges and train tracks.

pokemon.name: lairon
pokemon.dex: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.

pokemon.name: aggron
pokemon.dex: It claims a large mountain as its sole territory. It mercilessly thrashes those that violate its space.

pokemon.name: meditite
pokemon.dex: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.

pokemon.name: medicham
pokemon.dex: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

pokemon.name: electrike
pokemon.dex: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

pokemon.name: manectric
pokemon.dex: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.

pokemon.name: plusle
pokemon.dex: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.

pokemon.name: minun
pokemon.dex: Its dislike of water makes it take shelter under the eaves of houses in rain. It uses pom-poms made of sparks for cheering.

pokemon.name: volbeat
pokemon.dex: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

pokemon.name: illumise
pokemon.dex: It guides Volbeat to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.

pokemon.name: roselia
pokemon.dex: The beautiful flowers on its arms have toxic thorns. Don't even think about picking those flowers.

pokemon.name: gulpin
pokemon.dex: There is nothing its stomach can't digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

pokemon.name: swalot
pokemon.dex: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.

pokemon.name: carvanha
pokemon.dex: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

pokemon.name: sharpedo
pokemon.dex: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that crunch through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.

pokemon.name: wailmer
pokemon.dex: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.

pokemon.name: wailord
pokemon.dex: It is among the largest of all Pok√©mon. It herds prey in a pack then swallows the massed prey in one gulp.

pokemon.name: numel
pokemon.dex: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.

pokemon.name: camerupt
pokemon.dex: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

pokemon.name: camerupt
pokemon.dex: It burns coal inside its shell. If it is attacked, it belches thick, black smoke and flees.

pokemon.name: spoink
pokemon.dex: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.

pokemon.name: grumpig
pokemon.dex: It can gain control over foes by doing odd dance steps. The black pearls on its forehead are precious gems.

pokemon.name: spinda
pokemon.dex: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe's aim.

pokemon.name: trapinch
pokemon.dex: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.

pokemon.name: vibrava
pokemon.dex: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.

pokemon.name: flygon
pokemon.dex: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.

pokemon.name: cacnea
pokemon.dex: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

pokemon.name: cacturne
pokemon.dex: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert's heat.

pokemon.name: swablu
pokemon.dex: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

pokemon.name: altaria
pokemon.dex: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.

pokemon.name: zangoose
pokemon.dex: If it comes across a Seviper, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.

pokemon.name: seviper
pokemon.dex: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.

pokemon.name: lunatone
pokemon.dex: Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar cycle. It brims with power when exposed to the light of the full moon.

pokemon.name: solrock
pokemon.dex: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

pokemon.name: barboach
pokemon.dex: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

pokemon.name: whiscash
pokemon.dex: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.

pokemon.name: corphish
pokemon.dex: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

pokemon.name: crawdaunt
pokemon.dex: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

pokemon.name: baltoy
pokemon.dex: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.

pokemon.name: claydol
pokemon.dex: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pok√©mon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

pokemon.name: lileep
pokemon.dex: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.

pokemon.name: cradily
pokemon.dex: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.

pokemon.name: anorith
pokemon.dex: It is a kind of Pok√©mon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.

pokemon.name: armaldo
pokemon.dex: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.

pokemon.name: feebas
pokemon.dex: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.

pokemon.name: milotic
pokemon.dex: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.

pokemon.name: castform
pokemon.dex: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.

pokemon.name: kecleon
pokemon.dex: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.

pokemon.name: shuppet
pokemon.dex: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.

pokemon.name: banette
pokemon.dex: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pok√©mon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

pokemon.name: duskull
pokemon.dex: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.

pokemon.name: dusclops
pokemon.dex: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.

pokemon.name: tropius
pokemon.dex: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

pokemon.name: chimecho
pokemon.dex: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.

pokemon.name: absol
pokemon.dex: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.

pokemon.name: wynaut
pokemon.dex: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

pokemon.name: snorunt
pokemon.dex: It's said that if they are seen at midnight, they'll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.

pokemon.name: glalie
pokemon.dex: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

pokemon.name: spheal
pokemon.dex: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.

pokemon.name: sealeo
pokemon.dex: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.

pokemon.name: walrein
pokemon.dex: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.

pokemon.name: clamperl
pokemon.dex: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.

pokemon.name: huntail
pokemon.dex: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.

pokemon.name: gorebyss
pokemon.dex: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.

pokemon.name: relicanth
pokemon.dex: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.

pokemon.name: luvdisc
pokemon.dex: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pok√©mon will be blessed with eternal love.

pokemon.name: bagon
pokemon.dex: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.

pokemon.name: shelgon
pokemon.dex: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

pokemon.name: salamence
pokemon.dex: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

pokemon.name: beldum
pokemon.dex: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.

pokemon.name: metang
pokemon.dex: It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough, even a crash with a jet plane won't leave a scratch.

pokemon.name: metagross
pokemon.dex: It folds its four legs when flying. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.

pokemon.name: regirock
pokemon.dex: It is entirely composed of rocks with no sign of a brain or heart. It is a mystery even to modern scientists.

pokemon.name: regice
pokemon.dex: Research revealed that its body is made of the same kind of ice that is found at the South Pole.

pokemon.name: registeel
pokemon.dex: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.

pokemon.name: latias
pokemon.dex: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.

pokemon.name: latios
pokemon.dex: It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it can fly faster than a jet plane.

pokemon.name: kyogre
pokemon.dex: This Pok√©mon is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains. It has the power to control water.

pokemon.name: groudon
pokemon.dex: This legendary Pok√©mon is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling Kyogre.

pokemon.name: rayquaza
pokemon.dex: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.

pokemon.name: jirachi
pokemon.dex: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.

pokemon.name: deoxys
pokemon.dex: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pok√©mon.
